# collationType

**Instance Property**

The type of collation that the index element uses, either binary or R-tree.

## Declaration

```swift
var collationType: NSFetchIndexElementType { get set }
```

## Inspecting an Index Element Description

- **indexDescription**
- **isAscending**: A Boolean value that controls whether an index that supports direction is an ascending or descending index.
- **property**: A property description.
- **propertyName**: The specified name in the property description.

items.description: A Boolean value that controls whether an index that supports direction is an ascending or descending index.
items.name: isAscending

items.description: The specified name in the property description.
items.name: propertyName
